ygData.messageBody:
At 01:33 AM 8/30/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
>At some point I had seen data from a timing test that someone had done
>on this subject. I remember it saying that it didn't matter whether the
>mana song was sung repeatedly, or weaved with 2 others songs -- the mana
>recover was the same.

What I'd been told (I thought we had confirmationon this?) was that the
mana song enhances the regeneration speed, exactly like our Hymn does,
thus, it should be quite weavable. If anyone has any different
information, please let me know.

On a side note, I noticed something interesting last night. I died in
Unrest, and was revived (LOVE that spell - saved me a ten minute walk
back), and was nailed with the typical regeneration effects. This effect
is supposed to prevent you from immediately being buffed and ready to
charge - however, Bardic songs seem to be immune to this particular effect.
I was able to sing all of my songs immediately afterwards, and suffered
nothing except a massive loss of mana. Not that I use Mana.... ;)

Talies the Wanderer
